articles.title: Many adults still not aware of updated COVID-19 boosters, survey suggests - Healio
articles.description: A survey of U.S. adults who are vaccinated against COVID-19 found that many of them have not received a bivalent booster shot because they either do not know they are eligible for one or are unaware the shots exist.
